title: Planet painter

steps.hint: Définis l'arrière-plan using a hex code - **tape** `background '#444444'`
Définis the stroke to 0, to avoid drawing lines
Now let's open a loop - **tape** `for i in [ 0 .. 32 ]`
Now to set where each star will go -  **tape** `moveTo (random 1, 500), (random 1, 500)`
Dessine each star as un cercle de taille 5
Now, make sure you're out of the for loop (not indented) and **tape** `color purple`
Now draw un cercle de taille 170
Choisis a thick, white stroke - in a new line, **tape** `stroke white, 5`

completion_text: Astronomical! Change the colors and see what you can add to make your planet even cooler before hitting share!
